home.title: Welcome to DevTech
home.subtitle: DevTech is your trusted partner for digital innovation. We specialize in building modern web applications and robust e-commerce platforms with CMS integration. Our mission is to empower your business with the latest web technologies and deliver solutions tailored to your needs.

service1.title: Custom Web Application Development
service1.desc: Scalable, secure, and high-performance web apps for any business need.

service2.title: E-commerce Website Development
service2.desc: Online stores with seamless CMS integration, payment gateways, and inventory management.

service3.title: Content Management Systems (CMS)
service3.desc: Flexible and user-friendly CMS solutions for easy website management.

home.why1: Experienced team of web developers and designers
home.why3: Agile development process for faster delivery
home.why4: Latest web technologies and best practices
home.ctaTitle: Ready to start your web project?
home.ctaDesc: Contact us today to discuss your web application or e-commerce needs and get a free consultation!
